bossDialog: (The Phoenix spreads its wings and releases a furious, keening cry, the air warming around you! Its allies soon appear and attack alongside it!)
(You hear a loud shriek as a huge Phoenix swoops down from a hole in the ceiling and descends upon you!)
(You notice a few large eggs nestled among the treasure - unfortunately you seem to have noticed them a bit too late, as their Phoenix parent is now rather angry at your intrusion!)

master.dialog: Hello there! Care for a duel? I'm warning you, though: Phoenixes can never truly be killed. My party is practically invincible!\n\nNot convinced? Then let me show you firsthand the might of my Phoenixes!
